SELECT t1.today, count (CL_DD.cjsj) VALUE FROM ( select to_char (to_date(#{cxsj},'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_char(sysdate,'d')+8 - LEVEL + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') today from dual connect BY LEVEL <= 7 ) t1 LEFT JOIN CL_DD ON t1.today = to_char(CL_DD.cjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and JGDM = #{jgdm}
and JGDM like '${jgdmlike}%'
GROUP BY t1.today ORDER BY t1.today
